attributes.action: outlaw the sale and administration of Vulture Funds in any UK territory and to strongly campaign against Vulture Funds in all countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is an International Development issue for developing countries, especially Southern nations.

Vulture Funds are debts sold cheaply by creditors to companies who may then legally demand immediate payment by the debtor. Zambia have been told that a company called Donegal International, based in the British Virgin Islands, have a legal right to payment from them of around $15-20 million. This debt was bought by Donegal for $3.3 million when the debt itself was to be written off.

The payment of this debt will stifle spending on development in Zambia. Millions of people will suffer so that a few already rich people will benefit. This is an injustice.
